Author: Tischel
Name: Inventory Search Bar
Description:
Supports different types of filters to be able to find items by name, type, supported job or level requirements.

Supported Inventories:
	- Character Inventory
	- Chocobo Saddlebags
	- Retainer Inventory
	- Armoury
Punchline: Adds a search bar directly in the inventory window to filter items.
Changelog:
0.5.0.0
- Updated CriticalCommonLib which fixes some performance issues.
- Fixed inventory tabs being hard to click due to the search bar having a bigger clickable area than intended.
